You can't call it a Hotel or a Hostel, they are charging for the basic stuff like towel and all as they call themselves a Hostel, but are not even providing any basic Amenities which any hostel would, no common kitchen if you want to make something, if you want a cup of hot water you have to pay 3 Euro! I believe any Hostel or Hotel will not charge you for a cup of hot water.
Rest, Location is good, Peacefull area, tram station is 1 min walk away.

cleanliness .

Vegetarian food here by far amazing in variety and the taste.
If I can give will give 10Stars.

column48: The location was quite easily accessible. The staffs were very helpful and understanding and the rooms were perfect and comfortable. The swimming pool facility was very good here and it was a value for money property.

Most of the supporting staff doesn't know english. Remaining things are good.

column90: First day at Oakwood and I know I will love my next ten days of stay in here. This is the view from my room. Love the hospitality. First impression rating.. 5/5!
column91: Real value for money. Right location, right ambiance, although food choice was limited.
column92: The location is great and the room is spacious. The breakfast is amazing
column93: It was really the good hotel to stay in.The had good staff and services.It was the apartment type of hotel so apart from breakfast there was no dining services.The location was also very good and near to the KL center.
column95: Staff is co-operative, well aminities and perfect location to stay in KL
column96: Highly recommend. Budget friendly. Attentive Staff. Just 500m to KL Sentral Station. Main sightseeings are nearby. Well maintained rooms. Indian foods, local foods, etc are available on few foot steps. My family enjoyed well. Thanks to Metro Hotel.
column97: love it.. perfect stay.. beautiful room and awesome pool.. thankyou
column98: We stayed here for 2 nights. It's a beautiful property at a very central location in KL. You can almost see the Petronas from the hotel's driveway. The food is ok and they don't serve breakfast in the room. However, we had a comfortable stay as the rooms are pretty spacious and well built.
column99: One of the best hotel in klcc area. Staffs were really co-operative . Food was also good. Indeed a happy stay. :)
column100: Good place to be nice ambiance and service
column101: the best stay we experienced ever, loved the interior, ambience, food, location, customer service was at par excellence.
column102:
it was great experience.. hotel staff is kind and helpful.
great
column103: Rooms were clean and specious but they really need to improve their services, specially the restaurant area and the front desk staff. all of them were least concern about the guest comfort. we had the complimentary breakfast in the package but the quality and quantity both limited. during the length of our stay the menu was almost same and didn't look like a 5* service or quality. I would give it 4* for service.
column104:
We had a great experience
Location, view, room quality, cleanliness, breakfast all are great
But most of all our floor supervisor
Mr. Sherajul made our stay top class with his attitude, service, communication.
He made our stay memorable and 7 star.
column105: Staff behavior, amenities and services were nice. Location was nice, it was located near to KL Tower. There was free WIFi as complimentary services. There was no dining facility

column107: nice stay. Good hotel. must visit

column109: A VERY GOOD PLACE TO STAY IN KL. RIGHT IN THE HEART OF BUKIT BINTANG.

column116: The Location was excellent and also I got a great breakfast as complimentary by the hotel. A Good property listed by goibibo.
